1.title: 122. Bolum
1.plot: Gumustekin and Saadettin Kopek find a common target. Goncagul blackmails Selcan to keep her away from Gundogdu.

2.title: 123. Bolum
2.plot: Hayme warns Gundogdu about Gumustekin's potential ambitions. Selcan reaches an impasse because of Goncagul.

3.title: 124. Bolum
3.plot: Sungur Tekin requests a meeting with Ertugrul. Abdurrahman is in a precarious state, and Gundogdu sets out on a new campaign.

4.title: 125. Bolum
4.plot: Sungur Tekin warns Ertugrul about looming danger and hands him a valuable seal, but someone dangerous eavesdrops in the shadows.

5.title: 126. Bolum
5.plot: Goncagul steps up her charm offensive. Ertugrul returns to the camp with unpleasant news for Hayme.

6.title: 127. Bolum
6.plot: Selcan searches desperately for an ally against Aytolun. Gumustekin goes after something he believes to be in Sungur Tekin's possession.

7.title: 128. Bolum
7.plot: Sungur Tekin warns Ertugrul about looming danger and hands him a valuable seal, but someone dangerous eavesdrops in the shadows.

8.title: 129. Bolum
8.plot: Noyan's spies at the camp have an escape strategy, but Gundogdu double-crosses them and defends his plan in front of Korkut Bey.

9.title: 130. Bolum
9.plot: Hamza's loyalties come under question. Using Selcan as his bargaining chip, Noyan presents Gundogdu with a dilemma.

10.title: 131. Bolum
10.plot: Gokce and Halime come to blows over Selcan. Noyan's demands give Aytolun and Goncagul an opportunity.

11.title: 132. Ertugrul
11.plot: The Kayi clan struggles to solve the mystery of the missing seal. Gundogdu reveals his game to Noyan, but not without bloodshed.

12.title: 133. Ertugrul
12.plot: Gumustekin holds on to a valuable possession and conspires with Aytolun, putting Korkut Bey's life on the line.

13.title: 134. Ertugrul
13.plot: A powerful new enemy gets wind of Ertugrul military endeavors. Goncagul's envy drives her to desperation.

14.title: 135. Ertugrul
14.plot: With Noyan's fate in enemy hands, Tangut decides to avenge himself. Halime sneaks into Aytolun's tent and risks getting caught red-handed.

15.title: 136. Ertugrul
15.plot: Halime suspects Banu Cicek is hiding a secret. In a twist of fate for Noyan, Saadettin Kopek arrives to challenge the clan's decisions.

16.title: 137. Ertugrul
16.plot: Gumustekin makes a deal with Saadettin Kopek that may imperil the Kayi clan, but he is unaware of Saadettin Kopek's hidden agenda.

17.title: 138. Ertugrul
17.plot: Defying the camp's vote, Sungur Tekin decides to seal Noyan's fate himself, and Saadettin Kopek takes on a risky gamble with Noyan.

18.title: 139. Ertugrul
18.plot: The Oguz seal falls into the wrong hands, and Hayme calls Goncagul in for questioning. Sungur Tekin's mission comes at a cost.

19.title: 140. Ertugrul
19.plot: As the Kayi clan mourns its loss, Sungur Tekin derails Saadettin Kopek's plan, and Ertugrul suspects intrigue.

20.title: 141. Ertugrul
20.plot: After a confrontation with Selcan, Banu Cicek reconsiders her loyalty to Aytolun. Ertugrul squares off with Gumustekin.

21.title: 142. Ertugrul
21.plot: Gumustekin uses Goncagul to manipulate Gundogdu, and plans to frame Banu Cicek in a scheme that may also endanger Aytolun.

22.title: 143. Ertugrul
22.plot: When the camp descends into chaos on Gokce and Tugtekin's big night, Gundogdu discovers evidence in Korkut Bey's room.

23.title: 144. Ertugrul
23.plot: Selcan puts her own life at risk by telling the truth. Banu Cicek convinces Ertugrul to scrutinize the facts behind the poisoning.

24.title: 145. Ertugrul
24.plot: Selcan puts her own life at risk by telling the truth. Banu Cicek convinces Ertugrul to analyze the facts behind the problems at the Kayi tribe.

25.title: 146. Ertugrul
25.plot: Gundogdu is torn between Selcan and Goncagul. Ertugrul prepares to fight fire with fire and makes another decision that may pit him against Gundogdu.

26.title: 147. Ertugrul
26.plot: Goncagul pulls the wool over Gundogdu eyes and puts Selcan in a helpless position, but Ertugrul has a hidden plan to expose the real killers.

27.title: 148. Ertugrul
27.plot: Artuk Bey helps Ertugrul ensnare their enemies as Gumustekin and Aytolun prepare to realize their ultimate plan.

28.title: 149. Ertugrul
28.plot: After Selcan and Banu Cicek's meeting, Goncagul and Aytolun scramble to cover their tracks. Ertugrul suspects Saadettin Kopek has a hidden agenda.

29.title: 150. Ertugrul
29.plot: Aytolun and Goncagul walk into Ertugrul's trap. Tugtekin witnesses a scene that turns the tables on Gumustekin.

30.title: 151. Ertugrul
30.plot: Ertugrul reveals the shocking truth to Gundogdu. As Gumustekin takes the helm, Hayme and Tugtekin invite him to a private meeting.

31.title: 152. Ertugrul
31.plot: Ertugrul becomes Gumustekin's greatest threat, and Aytolun exploits Tugtekin's weakness in order to strike at Ertugrul.

32.title: 153. Ertugrul
32.plot: Gumustekin takes Ertugrul's bait. With Gundogdu in critical condition, Selcan and Halime unwittingly put their own lives on the line to find a cure.

33.title: 154. Ertugrul
33.plot: After a violent showdown with Selcan, Goncagul is nowhere to be seen. Gumustekin awaits final judgment.

34.title: 155. Ertugrul
34.plot: Saadettin Kopek arrives at the camp to challenge Ertugrul's authority. Ertugrul makes new enemies, and an old one returns.

35.title: 156. Ertugrul
35.plot: Gokce reveals a secret to Tugtekin, and Selcan brings Hayme good news. Ertugrul's rivals come together to plot revenge.

36.title: 157. Ertugrul
36.plot: As the Kayi clan celebrates, news about Gundogdu's health dampens the mood and another threat looms.

37.title: 158. Ertugrul
37.plot: Goncagul finds a partner in crime, and Saadettin Kopek makes her an impossible offer. Yigit and Dundar become new targets.

38.title: 159. Ertugrul
38.plot: As the two clans discuss their next migration, Ertugrul makes a bold strategic proposal. For Yigit and Dundar, Noyan is dangerously close.

39.title: 160. Ertugrul
39.plot: Ertugrul is not the only one with his eye on Byzantine territory, and a rival schemes to pit the two clans against each other.

40.title: 161. Ertugrul
40.plot: Saadettin Kopek sets his plan in motion with Noyan's help, and Goncagul plans ideas in Yigit's head.

41.title: 162. Ertugrul
41.plot: Saadettin Kopek deceives Sungur Tekin. Noyan has Yigit exactly where he wants him, but Turgut may jeopardize the plan.

42.title: 163. Ertugrul
42.plot: Saadettin Kopek writes a letter to Sultan Alaeddin and arrives at the camp to show Ertugrul a package related to Yigit.

43.title: 164. Ertugrul
43.plot: Ertugrul and Halime see through Saadettin Kopek's deception. As Noyan prepares for revenge, Gokce abed Tugtekin fall in harm's way.

44.title: 165. Ertugrul
44.plot: Ertugrul tries to outrun Noyan's army, and Gundogdu narrowly escapes a tragic fate. Gokce's life hangs by a thread.

45.title: 166. Ertugrul
45.plot: Saadettin Kopek draws up a new scheme against the Kayi clan, and Sungur Tekin is the key to its success. Tugtekin tracks down the traitor in the camp.

46.title: 167. Ertugrul
46.plot: Halime finds a hidden message in Yigit's letter. Gokce takes from Noyan something dear to him.

47.title: 168. Ertugrul
47.plot: Yigit has a trick up his sleeve that plays to Turgut's favor. Noyan exacts revenge against Tugtekin, while Ertugrul falls for an enemy's ruse.

48.title: 169. Ertugrul
48.plot: Ertugrul finds Saadettin Kopek's connection to Noyan. Saadettin Kopek attempts to manipulate Sungur Tekin and turn opinion against Ertugrul.

49.title: 170. Ertugrul
49.plot: Hayme confronts Saadettin Kopek and puts him in a difficult position with Noyan. Saadettin Kopek uses Sungur Tekin to force Ertugrul's hand.

50.title: 171. Ertugrul
50.plot: Saadettin Kopek divides the Kayi family as it suffers another tragic loss. Ertugrul catches Noyan unawares.

51.title: 172. Ertugrul
51.plot: Ertugrul makes a controversial decision that pits him against Turgut. Saadettin Kopek rushes to keep Sultan Alaeddin out of reach from Ertugrul.

52.title: 173. Ertugrul
52.plot: Ertugrul's decisions divide the camp, and Turgut chooses his own path. Saadettin Kopek puts pressure on Surgur Tekin to full-fill a risky mission.

53.title: 174. Ertugrul
53.plot: Hayme struggles to keep peace between Ertugrul and Gundogdu as the clans choose new leader. Sungur Tekin stirs up trouble for Ertugrul.

54.title: 175. Ertugrul
54.plot: Ertugrul plays into Saadettin Kopek's hands. A power struggle ensues in the camp as Akca Bey and Saadettin Kopek conspire behind the scenes.

55.title: 176. Ertugrul
55.plot: Ahead of the vote, Akca Bey helps Gundogdu gain political leverage against Ertugrul. Turgut goes after his own target.

56.title: 177. Ertugrul
56.plot: Saadettin Kopek gives Doruk Bey an important task and moves in on Ertugrul, who has no choice but to leave home base.

57.title: 178. Ertugrul
57.plot: Order breaks down in the camp as tensions heat up between Ertugrul and Akca bey, but Hayem stands her ground.

58.title: 179. Ertugrul Finale
58.plot: Sungur Tekin struggles to talk Hayme out of her final decision. Bogac Alp and Doruk Bey outnumber Ertugrul, but underestimate his abilities.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Winter approaches Suleyman Shah's camp. On a hunt, Ertugrul rescues prisoners from the Crusaders. Commander Titus and Ustadi Azam build a new army.

2.title: Av, Part 1
2.plot: Kara Toygar threatens the Kayi camp when Suleyman Shah refuses to turn over the prisoners. Titus learns the excruciating truth about his brother.

3.title: Av, Part 2
3.plot: In the search for a new camp, Suleyman sends Ertugrul to Aleppo and fuels fraternal jealously. Kurdogu makes a deal with Kara Toygar.

4.title: Hain Olan
4.plot: On the way to Aleppo, a dangerous enemy crosses paths with Ertugrul. Halime and her family come under attack.

5.title: Erugrul
5.plot: Fate hands Titus a golden chance for revenge, but the timing is not right. Selcan conspires with Gokce to boost their status in the family.

6.title: Süleyman Sah
6.plot: A premonition saves Ertugrul's life as Titus raises the stakes against him. Ustadi Azam turns up the heat on his rivals.

7.title: Ilahi Adalet
7.plot: Suleyman's prayers are answered, but Gundodgu's life hangs by a thread. Kurdoglu puts another plan into action.

8.title: Hesap Vakti
8.plot: A mysterious messenger puts a damper on the Kayi tribe's festivities. Suleyman presses Halime's father about his true identity.

9.title: Büyük Rüya
9.plot: Sensing imminent danger, Sehzade Numan asks Suleyman for a favor. Suleyman shows Kara Toygar that he has the upper hand - but not for long.

10.title: Dirilis Vakti
10.plot: The prisoner exchange goes awry. At the camp, Hayde stands up to Kurdoglu, who exploits another opportunity to strike against Suleyman.

11.title: Hain Kim?
11.plot: Kurdoglu puts his plan in motion, but Ertugrul is one step ahead of him. Selcan tries to turn the tables in her favor.

12.title: Gönlümüz Halep
12.plot: Kurdoglu intervenes on behalf of Kara Toygar. Selcan's maneuvering pays off, but Gundogdu spoils everything.

13.title: Bedrin Aslanlari
13.plot: On the way to Aleppo, Ertugrul and Halime walk into lion's den. Gundogdu and Kurdoglu have a heated face-off.

14.title: Gün Birlik Günü
14.plot: Ustadi Azam is determined to eliminate anyone who stands in the way of his campaign. Suleyman's greatest threat is close by.

15.title: Adalet Ordusu
15.plot: Selcan tries to kill two birds with one stone, but her ambition becomes her downfall. With Halime in critical condition, Ertugrul's group splits up.

16.title: Davamiz
16.plot: Ustadi Azam uses Ibn Arabi to tighten the screws on Giovanni. An informant pulls the wool over Sahabettin's eyes.

17.title: Er Meydani
17.plot: Sahabettin falls deeper into love's trap. The Knights Templar's lethal weapon strikes the Kayi tribe on the eve of their migration.

18.title: Dirilis Için
18.plot: Sahabettin is key to Ertugrul's plan, but El Aziz stands in the way. Turgut and Yigit are still missing, but Ertugrul has a more immediate problem.

19.title: Beylik Zamani
19.plot: After narrowly escaping a tragic fate, Ertugrul makes a radical plan as time runs out for Sahabettin.

20.title: Büyük Oyun
20.plot: With El Aziz unwavering in his decision, Sahabettin prepares to embrace his fate, but a hooded stranger makes a surprise showing.

21.title: Zulüm Devam Etmez
21.plot: Izadora takes Yigit under her wing, Nasir has El Aziz wrapped around his finger and orders a thorough manhunt to finish what he started.

22.title: Zafer Günü, Part 1
22.plot: Ertugrul cautions Numan, who puts himself in the firing line at El Aziz's palace. A visitor gives Turgut hope.

23.title: Zafer Günü, Part 2
23.plot: Deli Demir heads for Aleppo and cannot believe what he sees upon arrival. Ertugrul puts his life on the line to set a trap for Nasir.

24.title: Kutlu Fetih
24.plot: Titus brushes up against a sworn enemy from the past. During a confrontation with Nasir, Ertugrul faces a difficult choice.

25.title: Milletin Dirilisi, Part 1
25.plot: Leyla helps Ertugrul at a critical moment, but her absence draws attention. Seeking answers about her family, Izadora makes a deal with Turgut.

26.title: Milletin Dirilisi, Part 2
26.plot: Ertugrul makes a narrow escape. Nasir has an elaborate plan for Halime, who struggles to make El Aziz see the truth.

1.title: Bir Karis Toprak Vermeyiz
1.plot: Aykiz takes matters into her own hands and pays Eftelya a visit. Ustadi Azam goes after a mole on his own turf.

2.title: Boyun Egmeyecegiz
2.plot: Gundogdu and Selcan come to blows over her ambitions. Ertugrul brings pressure to bear on Eftelya, but the tribe needs her alive.

3.title: Birlik Vakti
3.plot: To infiltrate the Knights Templar's base, Ertugrul deliberately leaks information. Numan's decision deals a major blow to Halime.

4.title: Beklenen Kahraman
4.plot: Ertugrul captures an important prisoner on the way. Ustadu Azam grooms Yigit for the final stage of his plan.

5.title: Yalniz Degilsin
5.plot: A message arrives at the Kayi camp, and Selcan decides it is time to settle accounts with Suleyman. Marcus falls for the Kayi tribe's ruse.

6.title: Kutlu Uyanis
6.plot: Titus wreaks havoc on the camp. A surprise visitor knocks on Afsin's door, and Numan leaves Ertugrul no choice but to walk away from Halime.

7.title: Dirilis Günü, Part 1
7.plot: As Titu's plan spirals out of control and he and Kurdoglu look for a way out, Sahabettin watches them closely.

8.title: Dirilis Günü, Part 2
8.plot: The Knights Templar's position in Aleppo depends on Eftelya, who tries to turn Ertugrul against Halime.

9.title: Gaza Vakti
9.plot: Eftelya decides her own fate. A showdown between Ertugrul and Titus gets interrupted, and Ertugrul questions Kara Toygar's true motives.

10.title: Dirilis Atesi
10.plot: Nasir oversteps his bounds with El Aziz, and Halime seizes her chance to appeal on behalf of the Kayi tribe.

11.title: Beklenen Safak
11.plot: In pitting herself against Selcan, Aykiz plays with fire. Ertugrul rushes to head off the diplomatic mess Nasir created.

12.title: Milletim Için
12.plot: Selcan falls out of Hayme's favor. Ertugrul walks into an important meeting and exposes a conspiracy against his tribe.

13.title: Ihanetin Bedeli
13.plot: El Aziz hands down a harsh sentence to Leyla and Nanny. Ertugrul and Gundogdu return home to a slew of shocking news.

14.title: Bas Koydum
14.plot: News about Halime sends Ertugrul back on the road. Claudius accepts a mission that puts Ibn Arabi in harm's way.

15.title: Allah Var Gam Yok
15.plot: Kurdoglu tries to turn Suleyman and Gundogdu against Ertugrul, who negotiates with El Aziz at knife-point.

16.title: Hilalin Gölgesinde
16.plot: Ustadi Azam loses his grip on Aleppo. At the camp, public opinion is not in Suleyman's favor, and Hayme cracks down on Selcan.

17.title: Fetih Vakti
17.plot: Claudiu's mission hits a snag. Hayme discovers that Selcan has a personal vendetta, but Gundogdu stands by Selcan.

18.title: Zaferin Serefi
18.plot: Gundogdu unwittingly becomes a part of Kurdoglu's scheme. Hayme gives Halime and Gokce a dilemma.

19.title: Sefer Bizim Zafer Allah'indir
19.plot: Gundogdu squares off with Ertugrul. Selcan stirs the pot at the family meal, where an unexpected guest arrives with distressing news for Halime.

20.title: Hak ile Batilin Savasi
20.plot: Cardinal Thomas and Titus carry out their plan with Turgut, whose decisions spell disaster for Ertugrul.

21.title: Hakkin Sesi
21.plot: Suleyman meets with the Seijuks, but Ertugrul's return throws the camp into disarray. Halime refuses the Seijuk sultan's offer.

22.title: Fetih Atesi
22.plot: With their greatest obstacle out of the way, Ustadi Azam and Kurdoglu advance on their target, but Gundogdu tests Kurdoglu loyalty.

23.title: Kirli Oyun
23.plot: A visitor brings news of Turgut to the Kayi camp and puts Kurdoglu in an unfavorable position. A murder plot unravels.

24.title: Büyük Mücadele
24.plot: Kurdoglu incurs Selcan's wrath. Izadora helps Suleyman connect the dots, and Eftelya gets her hands on an important letter.

25.title: Firsat Vermeyecegiz
25.plot: Ertugrul and Suleyman put Kurdoglu on the stand, but Gundogdu steps in. Thomas tests Ustadi Azam's patience.

26.title: Adalet Vakti
26.plot: Turgut is not out of the woods yet. Selcan pulls strings to influence Gundogdu, and Hayme loses control of the situation.

27.title: Kutlu Gün
27.plot: Gokce overhears Selcan's secret plan, and Suleyman invites a contest for power that threatens to pit his sons against each other.

28.title: Gaza Yolu
28.plot: Gokce sees Selcan's true colors and confronts her. Gundogdu plays into Kurdoglu's hands, but someone more powerful has a hidden plan.

29.title: Hak Yolu
29.plot: Selcan loses favor with Gundogdu as her ambitions get the best of her. Kurdoglu unleashes another weapon to sow chaos in the camp.

30.title: Adalet Oyunu
30.plot: While Suleyman gives him the benefit of the doubt, Kurdoglu misleads Suleyman's men. Yigit life is in enemy hands.

31.title: Devletin Istikbali
31.plot: After losing their only witness, Ertugrul and his men are back to square one on the hunt for the traitor, but Izadora gives them another lead.

32.title: Bizim Yolumuz
32.plot: Kurdoglu takes advantage of Ertugrul's absence. When the Knight's Templar outnumber Ertugrul, his wit is the only thing that can save him.

33.title: Devletin Bekasi
33.plot: Kurdoglu tries to force Selcan's hand and makes Turgut his right-hand man. Ertugrul has valuable information that Ustadi Azam needs.

34.title: Kutlu Mücadele, Part 1
34.plot: Struggling to keep order among his subjects, Kurdoglu hands down Suleyman's sentence and sets a dangerous trap for him and Hayme.

35.title: Kutlu Mücadele, Part 2
35.plot: Selcan repents and decides to mend fences with those she has betrayed. Ertugrul meets an unlikely ally.

1.title: Bir Milletin Dirilisi
1.plot: Ertugrul prepares to settle accounts with Kurdoglu, who is suspicious of Ayhan's loyalties. The Kayi tribe's fate depends on Turgut.

2.title: Fetih Vaktidir
2.plot: The Knights Templar's plan comes apart at the seams, and Izadora pays a price. Claudius causes a rift between Thomas and Ustadi Azam.

3.title: Hakikatin Pesinde, Part 1
3.plot: A confrontation between Ertugrul and Kurdoglu ends in bloodshed. With Ustadi Azam in grave condition, Thomas gains the upper hand.

4.title: Hakikatin Pesinde, Part 2
4.plot: Kurdoglu judgment day arrives, but Thomas still has one advantage over the Kayi tribe. Ibn Arabi convince Selcan to change her ways.

5.title: Dirilis Ruhu
5.plot: Titus is determined to eradicate the Kayi tribe. Claudius brings urgent news to Ertugrul, who plans an offensive campaign into enemy territory.

6.title: Birlik Zamani
6.plot: After Deli Demir and Afsin Bey find a way to infiltrate the Knights Templar, the Kayi tribe readies for battle.

7.title: Kutlu Dava
7.plot: Ertugurl's army catches the Knights Templar of guard. In a tight spot, Titus suspects there's an informant from within.

8.title: Intikam Günü
8.plot: Under Titu's watch, Omer plays a risky double game. Selcan's sudden realization changes her fate.

9.title: Kutlu Zafer
9.plot: Omer pays a heavy price for his betrayal. Yigit helps to lead Erttugrul and his army on the road to victory.

10.title: Fetih Için
10.plot: Turgut gets his sweet revenge. With Titus still a threat to the Kayi tribe, Ertugrul's men set out on a manhunt.

11.title: Beyimizin Yolunda
11.plot: Gundogdu responds unexpectedly to Selcan's big news. At the Kayi camp, danger still lingers in the shadows.

12.title: Bir Ölür Bin Diriliriz
12.plot: Selcan atones for her crimes and risks her life for Gundogdu, who confronts a dangerous enemy from the past.

13.title: Zafere Dogru
13.plot: Ibn Arabi leaves Ertugrul with a valuable relic. A perilous journey lies ahead for Ertugrul and Suleyman.

14.title: Hesap Günü
14.plot: As Ertugrul consolidates power across Anatolia, Hayme fears that an ominous premonition may come true.

15.title: Adalet
15.plot: As the Kayi tribe struggles with its sudden loss, Hayme calls meeting to form a strategy against new threats.

16.title: Adalet Tecelli Edecek
16.plot: Ertugrul and Halime encounter new enemies, and sudden misfortune befalls the Kayi camp.

17.title: Davamiz Bir
17.plot: Ertugrul's fate is uncertain, and the Oguz Turks swear to take revenge, but a shadowy figure watches them.

18.title: Episode #3.18
18.plot: Aytolun has her own ambitions. Gokce overhears Halime break the big news to Hayme.

19.title: Episode #3.19
19.plot: Gundogdu attempts to track down Noyan, while the Kayi tribe mourns two tragic losses.

20.title: Episode #3.20
20.plot: Selcan warns Gundogdu about the alliance, as Aytolun plants ideas in Tugtekin's head. Noyan turns up the heat on Ertugrul.

21.title: Birlikte Yürümek
21.plot: An informant lurks among the Turks, who mobilize for a new campaign. Aytolun sets her plan in motion and inquires after Gokce.

22.title: Episode #3.22
22.plot: The Turks and Mongols play cat and mouse as Gundogdu and Tugtekin attempt to isolate the mole in their group.

23.title: Episode #3.23
23.plot: To solidify the alliance, Korkut Bey makes Hayme an offer. Aytolun learns something new about Gokce that complicates her plan.

24.title: Episode #3.24
24.plot: Hayme's decision threatens to pit Selcan against Aytolun. Ertugrul's disappearance leaves Noyan in a vulnerable position.

25.title: Episode #3.25
25.plot: Gundogdu tries to get behind Noyan's motives, but the Kayi tribe's greatest threat lies within.

26.title: Episode #3.26
26.plot: Tugtekin faces a new competitor and lets his ambitions get the best of him. Tensions escalate between the clans.

27.title: Episode #3.27
27.plot: Aytolun and Tugtekin plot a power grab, and Ertugrul's announcement leads to an important vote in the camp.

28.title: Episode #3.28
28.plot: The vote heightens tensions between the clans and sets Gokce against Halime, as Selcan's warnings fall on deaf ears.

29.title: Episode #3.29
29.plot: Tugtekin becomes fed up with Ertugrul's lingering influence on the camp. Ertugrul makes a separate plan with those still loyal to him.

30.title: 91. Bolum
30.plot: Noyan makes Gundogdu his next target. Kocabas's words instigate a confrontation that changes Ertugrul's place in the camp.

1.title: 92. Bolum
1.plot: Tugtekin intends to flex his muscles in front of Ertugrul, and Gokce decides to play a different game.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Korkut Bey is haunted by his own demons in the Kayi tribe. As Ertugrul struggles to get back on his feet, mutiny lurks around the corner.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Hamza's action leads to dire consequences for the Kayi tribe. With Abdurrahman's life on the line, Ertugrul goes after a traitor.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Hayme helps mend fences between Ertugrul and Gundogdu. Tugtekin's tactics against Kayi subjects become harsher with the tribe.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: When the two clans face off over Abdurrahman's sentence, Gundogdu makes Korkut Bey an offer and saves the day.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: When the two clans face off over Abdurrahman's sentence, Gundogdu makes Korkut Bey an offer and saves the day. Ertugrul plans a ruse with Deli Demir's help and is forced to leave the camp, while an enemy lurks nearby.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: Ertugrul experiences a close shave as Noyan's army draws dangerously close. Hayme takes matters into her own hands.

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Selcan tries to uncover what Aytolun is after, but Ertugrul is one step ahead and sends his team on a mission back to the camp.

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: Noyan tests Abdurrahman's loyalties. Hayme confronts Korkut Bey about Aytolun and Tugtekin's behavior.

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Noyan tests Abdurrahman's loyalties. Hayme confronts Korkut Bey about Aytolun and Tugtekin's behavior. Stunned by Hayme's announcement, Selcan tries to stop Gokce from falling into Aytolun's trap, but Gokce has not yet made up her mind.

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: A surprise visitor traces Ertugrul to his hidden refuge. Ertokus Bey arrives at the camp with an important message for Ertugrul and the tribe.

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Abdurrahman talks himself out of a tragic end. Kocabas attempts to get a hold of Ertokus Bey's secret, but someone else overhears.

13.title: Episode #4.13
13.plot: Ertokus Cheks Korkut Bey's ambitions, but Aytolun refuses to back down. Noyan's men corner Ertugrul.

14.title: Episode #4.14
14.plot: Goncagul proves herself a force to be reckoned with. Gumustekin Bey's sudden arrival turns the tables and divides the camp.

15.title: Episode #4.15
15.plot: Hayme stands up to Gumustekin and gives the Dodurga clan an ultimatum. Gokce eavesdrops on Halime.

16.title: Episode #4.16
16.plot: Artuk Bey encourages Korkut Bey to take charge. Gundogdu becomes a pawn in two separate games of power.

17.title: Episode #4.17
17.plot: Hayme's courier carries out a risky task. After she sees a stranger accost Aytolun, Selcan digs into Aytolun's past.

18.title: Episode #4.18
18.plot: Selcan stands to pay dearly for what she discovers. Ertugruls battles on two fronts, and Tugtekin digs his own grave.

19.title: Episode #4.19
19.plot: Noyan plots to weaken the Kayi and Dodurga clans by dividing them. Aytolun and Goncagul's plan for Gundogdu begins to take shape.

20.title: Episode #4.20
20.plot: Unfortunate news arrives, wreaking havoc on the camp. Aytolun grows desperate to stop Korkut Bey from acting on a rash decision against the Kayi clan.

21.title: Episode #4.21
21.plot: An orchestrated riot concludes unexpectedly when a visitor's sudden arrival at the camp leads to bloodshed.

22.title: Episode #4.22
22.plot: Ertugrul brings news that may give the Kayi clan a second chance. As Hayme's condition remains uncertain, Selcan confronts Aytolun.

23.title: Episode #4.23
23.plot: Gumustekin stands his ground in a negotiation over Ertugrul's standing. A ruthless enemy is hot on Halime's tail.

24.title: Episode #4.24
24.plot: Gundogdu gives Selcan an ultimatum. In a vulnerable position, Ertugrul warns Gundogdu about another infiltrator.

25.title: Episode #4.25
25.plot: Gundogdu attempts to make Korkut Bey see the truth about recent treachery in the camp. Halime's pursuer catches her and Deli Demir unawares.

26.title: Episode #4.26
26.plot: Ertugrul's day of reckoning is imminent. Halime's life hangs by a thread, but a veiled stranger comes to her rescue.

27.title: Episode #4.27
27.plot: Karabek brings in a witness during Ertugrul's sentencing, and a battle of wills ensues between the two clans.

28.title: Episode #4.28
28.plot: Noyan's old rival makes a comeback. Gumustekin's plan becomes a pipe dream, and Aytolun decides to resort to more desperate measures.

29.title: Episode #4.29
29.plot: Noyan plots a new scheme against the Kayi clan. As leadership changes in the camp, Tugtekin refuses to give up on the power game.

30.title: 121. Bolum - Sezon Finali
30.plot: Ertugrul's grows suspicious of Noyan's true intentions toward Abdurrahman. Artuk takes Ertugrul to an important gathering.

imdb.plot outline: A Turkish warrior named Ertugrul from the 13th century, one of the most famous warriors of his time, and also the father of Osman (the founder of the ottoman empire). He is a ambitious man who wants to bring peace and justice. He is in a war with the crusaders at one side, the Byzantines at another side and the brutally expending mongols who killed a lot of Turks at another side. In between this he is in a psychological war between his love and his so called destiny.
imdb.title: Resurrection: Ertugrul
plot: The heroic story of Ertugrul Ghazi, the father of Osman (Uthman) who founded the Ottoman Caliphate.::Tamimi

A Turkish warrior named Ertugrul from the 13th century, one of the most famous warriors of his time, and also the father of Osman (the founder of the ottoman empire). He is a ambitious man who wants to bring peace and justice. He is in a war with the crusaders at one side, the Byzantines at another side and the brutally expending mongols who killed a lot of Turks at another side. In between this he is in a psychological war between his love and his so called destiny.::ahmetkozan

As the holy acrimonious crusades swept through Middle East, nomad Turkish tribes fought their way into the new promised land. A young but brave warrior, Erutgrul Ghazi, the son of Suleiman Shah after the death of his father had to take charge of the situation in his tribe. From crusaders to Byzantine, Ertugrul together with his companions strived through the bad doers. A huge problem showed up in the horizon. The malicious Mongols with the maverick Noyan in charge threatened their camp.::Kevin von Agastra

An Islamic themed drama series inspired by true events and based upon historical characters in Islam. About the heroic efforts of Ertugrul Ghazi, the father of Uthman (founder of the Ottoman Empire). It's about the struggles he faced alongside his nomadic tribe in finding a secure settlement to live, how he defended their lands and liberated other lands from oppressive rulers (Crusaders and Mongols) - full of scenes of tawakkul (reliance on Allah), honour, spiritually uplifting and emotional at times, treachery, greed for power, fairness and justice, intertwined with tales of love, humbleness, respect for Awliya, power of zikr, brotherhood, unity and traditions.::Nadeem Ahmad
